architectureStyle.description: Brutalist, oppressive, functional - designed for control and military efficiency
keyElements: Minimal windows - small, high, often barred
Cobra/serpent head motifs echoing ship design
Surveillance towers and security checkpoints everywhere
Designed for occupation - controlling subject populations
Oval doorways and ribbed wall textures
Central Archon prominence in all government buildings
Obsidian Order watching from hidden vantage points
architectureStyle.colors: Ochre brown, tan, concrete gray, rust orange accents, yellow warning lights
architectureStyle.materials: Reinforced concrete, heavy duranium, security glass, surveillance equipment

buildings.name: Central Command
buildings.description: Military high command headquarters - massive, imposing seat of Cardassian power

buildings.name: Detapa Council Hall
buildings.description: Civilian government building - largely ceremonial under military dominance

buildings.name: Prefect's Office
buildings.description: Colonial administrator building from which occupied worlds are controlled

buildings.name: Legate's Compound
buildings.description: High-ranking officer's administrative center with personal security detail

buildings.name: Family Registry
buildings.description: Tracks all citizens and their families - used for leverage and control

buildings.name: Tribunal Court
buildings.description: Justice facility where verdicts are decided before trials begin - show trials

buildings.name: Obsidian Order Facility
buildings.description: Secret police headquarters appearing normal outside, hiding interrogation chambers

buildings.name: Detention Center
buildings.description: Prison facility infamous for harsh conditions, labor camps, and interrogation

buildings.name: Propaganda Ministry
buildings.description: Controls information, education, and media - rewrites history to favor Cardassia

buildings.name: Security Checkpoint
buildings.description: Controls movement between sectors with ID verification, searches, and surveillance

buildings.name: Military Academy
buildings.description: Officer training facility emphasizing discipline, tactics, and loyalty to Cardassia

buildings.name: Garrison Headquarters
buildings.description: Military base for occupation troops with barracks, armory, and vehicle depot

buildings.name: Weapons Factory
buildings.description: Manufacturing disruptors and military equipment, often using forced labor

buildings.name: Defense Battery
buildings.description: Planetary defense installation with spiral wave disruptors and targeting systems

buildings.name: Shipyard Control
buildings.description: Administers ship construction, overlooking orbital construction facilities

buildings.name: Ore Processing Facility
buildings.description: Industrial building for processing mined resources using forced labor

buildings.name: Labor Assignment Office
buildings.description: Assigns workers to projects - no one is unemployed in Cardassia

buildings.name: Power Distribution Hub
buildings.description: Energy management facility that can cut power to rebellious sectors

buildings.name: Food Distribution Center
buildings.description: Controls food supply - rations allocated based on cooperation with authorities

buildings.name: Medical Facility
buildings.description: Hospital where Cardassians get priority, subject populations receive minimal care

buildings.name: Science Division
buildings.description: Research facility developing advanced technology, often stolen from other races

buildings.name: Communications Center
buildings.description: Controls all communications in the sector - monitors, censors, and intercepts

buildings.name: Trade Administration
buildings.description: Controls commerce in state-managed economy where everything is monitored

buildings.name: Embassy
buildings.description: Diplomatic facility where even diplomacy is backed by threat of military force

buildings.name: Residential Block
buildings.description: Uniform housing for citizens - monitored with minimal privacy

buildings.name: Recreation Facility
buildings.description: State-approved entertainment with kanar bars and holosuites running approved programs
